articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Wildfires kill at least 3 and displace thousands across southern Europe - NBC News
articles.description: ATHENS, Greece — Wildfires intensified across southern Europe on Wednesday with a round-the-clock battle to protect the perimeter of Greece’s third-largest city and at least three deaths reported in Spain, Turkey and Albania
articles.content: ATHENS, Greece Wildfires intensified across southern Europe on Wednesday with a round-the-clock battle to protect the perimeter of Greeces third-largest city and at least three deaths reported in Spa… [+4369 chars]
